body:
I have 3 workflows:

- W1 - main Workflow works as decorator
- W2 - child Workflow with 3 activities (W2.A1, W2.A2 and W2.A3)
- W3 - child Workflow with other 3 activities (W3.A1, W3.A2 and W3.A3)

## Expected Behavior

W1 -> W2 -> W2.A1 -> W2.A2 -> W2.A3 -> (return with res to W1) -> W3 -> W3.A1 -> W3.A2 -> W3.A3

## Actual Behavior

W1 -> W2 -> **W3**.A1 (???)

## Steps to Reproduce the Problem

  1. Triggering W1
  2. Correct, expected dependencies are described in "Expected Behavior" for W1, W2 and W3.

## Specifications

  - Version: ui 2.31.2 / server 1.24.3
  - Platform: Docker

Some context for clarity: I have one single worker, one task queue per all workflows and activities, workflows are being registered before activities.
title: Unexpected behavior: wrong activity is being scheduled by workflow
